titles.title: Magnerobo Ga-Keen
Magnetic Robot Ga Keen
Magnos Robot
Gakeen
マグネロボ ガ・キーン
Magnos the Robot
Magnos le robot
Gakeen Magnetico Robot
Robot Magnos
Super Magnetrón

anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch69997 [Dr. Kazuki] finds a relation between recent chaotic incidents on earth and the awakening of ancient race of aliens named http://anidb.net/ch70011 [Izawarians]. So he builds a robot based on the science of magnetism and sphere joint theory named http://anidb.net/ch70004 [Ga-keen]. The pilots undergo a dangerous augmentation process and change into http://anidb.net/ch70005 [Magnetman Plus] and http://anidb.net/ch70006 [Magnetman Minus], making them ready to perform sweet cross, and locking their joint bodies in Ga-keen. Giving it an enough energy to fight over synthetic beasts made by Izawarians.

externalentity.identifier: マグネロボ_ガ・キーン

tag.name: robot
tag.description: A robot is an automatically guided machine, able to do tasks on its own. Another common characteristic is that by its appearance or movements, a robot often conveys a sense that it has intent or agency of its own. Not to be confused with android (human-like robot).

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: mecha
tag.description: Mecha in Japanese basically means mechanical things; everything from an electric whisk or a car to a spaceship or a robot. Here however we limit it to the more exotic things usually referred to as mecha anime: robots, whether controlled by a human or not, and their ilk. See Androids, Piloted Robots, Power Suits, Robot Helpers, Transforming Robots for a more specific classification.

tag.name: transforming craft
tag.description: A transforming craft is an object built by humans or other intelligent lifeforms, usually a robot but sometimes also a vehicle of some sort, that can rearrange its parts in order to switch between a minimum of two forms.

tag.name: piloted robot
tag.description: Piloted Robots are, as the name suggests, robots that cannot control themselves; they need to be steered from somewhere, this can be from a human sitting inside or a remote controlled option.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: science fiction
tag.description: Science fiction stories usually focus on how situations could be different in the future when we are more technologically advanced; due to either our own achievements or having met with other civilizations whom we have learned from.

tag.name: super robot
tag.description: These robots tend to have almost semi-magical attacks, which seem impossible or non-realistic, and/or perform non-realistic transformation sequences where they seem to gain/lose mass and utterly change their form, even if it means making their super-hard armour bend like plastic sheets.

tag.name: gattai
tag.description: Gattai is when two fighting spirits collide and unite, when a man`s soul is ablaze! When you are about to get your asses kicked by the big bad evil, it`s time to show your true fighting spirit and gattai, literally combine with your mecha to become at least ten times as powerful and kick the big bad evil`s ass.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Kazuki Mai
character.description: Mai is the only doughter of Professor Kazuki, and the childhood friend of Takeru. She pilots Mighty, and plays the role of the - pole in Ga-keen. She might not show it, but it`s hinted that she has a crush on Takeru

character.name: Houjou Takeru
character.description: Takeru`s only dream was to beat his father and become the world`s best martial artist and thus escapes from home. He decides to put his dream on hiatus and join forces with Professor Kazuki to save the earth. His body has a high resistance to electricity.

character.name: Komatsu Hitori
character.description: Komatsu is the most influential member of God Freedom Crew. he is also very skilled at close combat and is so wise despite his age. His influence decreases since the arrival of Takeru. But he claims him as an intresting guy.

character.name: Hizen Futoshi
character.description: Futoshi is one of the God Freedom Crew. He is very sensitive over mai. He likes children and is a funny guy. But it seems he is rather jealous over Takeru and enjoys making fun of him.

character.name: Kazuki Mamoru
character.description: Professor Kazuki is a scientist and the creator of God Freedom and Ga-keen. He was the first person who could find a relation between recent incidents on earth and Izawarians. He is an old friend of Takeru`s father.

character.name: Tsuji Tensai
character.description: Tsuji is a crew of god freedom and is the mechanic, developer, controller and analyzer.

character.name: Houjou Touru
character.description: Houjou is Takeru`s father. He is a globally recognized martial artist. He is a strict teacher and his strict method is the main reason of Takeru running away from home. He is an old friend of Kazuki Mamoru.

character.name: Mobile Fortress God Freedom
character.description: God Freedom is a mobile science lab made by Professor Kazuki and his development team. It`s also a storeroom for research robots and Ga-keen Parts.

character.name: Space Research Robot Plyzer
character.description: Plyzer is a space research robot. The pilot is transferred by a motorbike named spirit into it. It later can become the right flying jet of Ga-keen, Giving it the ability to fly.

character.name: Underwater Research Robot Mighty
character.description: Mighty is an underwater research robot. The pilot is transferred by a motorboat named Angel into it. It later can become the left flying jet of Ga-keen, Giving it the ability to fly.

character.name: Magnerobo Ga-keen
character.description: Ga-keen is a magnetic robot which has many weapons. Magnet Man Plus and Magnet Man Minus should combine by a magnetic function named Sweet Cross. then, they both will become the commander and pilot of Ga-keen, giving it double energy. It can also fly by grabbing Mighty and Plyzer.

character.name: Magneman Plus
character.description: Magnet Man Plus is made by injecting magnetic energy to a human which has high electric resistance. This process increases the mind and body ability and makes it ready to perform Sweet Cross.

character.name: Magneman Minus
character.description: Magnet Man Minus is made by injecting magnetic energy to a human which has high electric resistance. This process increases the mind and body ability and makes it ready to perform Sweet Cross.

character.name: Cockrow Shougun
character.description: Cockrow is an alien and the general of underground.

character.name: Staffy Shougun
character.description: Staffy is an alien and the general of underwater.

character.name: Brain Soushireikan
character.description: Brain is an alien and the earth invasion commander in chief.

character.name: Device Choukan
character.description: Device is an alien and is the Director of Intelligence.

character.name: Izawaru Seijin
character.description: Izawarians are an ancient race of humanoids who traveled to earth two million years ago because their own planet was destroyed. They are awakened again in year 1977 and are planning to destroy the earth and gain control over it.

character.name: Houjou Kotoe
character.description: Kotoe is Takeru`s sister.

character.name: Ushio Hakase
character.description: Dr. Ushio is a scientist and analyzer working as a god freedom crew.
